snippet.title: New Super Mario Bros. Legacy - Revival Trailer
snippet.description:
New Super Mario Bros. Legacy is a full remaster of New Super Mario Bros. for the Nintendo DS ported to the Nintendo Wii and built on NewerSMBW.

The mod aims to apply updated level theming, remastered soundtracks, four player compatibility, new world maps, and a fresh way to enjoy a timeless release we all know and love!

Join our Discord server for updates regarding development!
https://discord.gg/BEM62dx6qc
